## 2. Description

*Briefly describe the changes and the problem it solves. Link to Linear Ticket or GitHub Issue.*

## 3. Risk Assessment (ITIL Change Enablement)

*Required for all changes affecting Production.*

- **Impact**: [Low / Medium / High]

## 4. Checklist

- [ ] Code follows `docs/governance/governance.md` standards.
- [ ] Linting passed (`npm run lint`).
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated (`npm run test:unit`).
- [ ] Verified locally.
